document.full_text: a retired sanitation worker accused of murdering 10 women and girls who has been dubbed the "grim sleeper" may have killed eight additional victims, police said on tuesday.
document.title: accused "grim sleeper" suspected in more deaths
lines_and_colors: a retired sanitation worker accused of murdering 10 women and girls who has been dubbed the "grim sleeper" may have killed eight additional victims, police said on tuesday.
